resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

Information 
 
This simple but useful App uses your phoneâ€™s camera to alert you when someone is within your six-foot safety zone. If someone is within 6 feet, the box around the person turns red. If the person is more than 6 feet away (approximately 2 meters), the the box around the person turns green. 

 This app works best with the newest phone models. If your phone is old, be careful with the battery drainage.
